#labels Featured,janrain,engage,rpx,janrain4j,java,taglibrary,taglib,jsp
==signInEmbedded==

Embeds the sign-in widget.

_Examples_

{{{
<janrain:signInEmbedded />
}}}

_Attributes_

  * `applicationDomain` (optional) - The Janrain application domain. E.g. `https://mydomain.rpxnow.com/`
  * `tokenUrl` (optional) - The token url. E.g. `http://mydomain.com/token`
  * `defaultProvider` (optional) - The ..
  * `flags` (optional) - The ..
  * `languagePreference` (optional) - The language preference. E.g. `en` or `nl`
  * `width` (optional) - The width of the embedded sign-in widget in pixels. Defaults to `400`
  * `height` (optional) - The height of the embedded sign-in widget in pixels. Defaults to `240`


==signInLink==

Renders the sign-in link.

_Examples_

{{{
<janrain:signInLink>Sign In</janrain:signInLink>
}}}

_Attributes_

  * `applicationDomain` (optional) - The Janrain application domain. E.g. `https://mydomain.rpxnow.com/`
  * `tokenUrl` (optional) - The token url. E.g. `http://mydomain.com/token`
  * `style` (optional) - The ..
  * `styleClass` (optional) - The ..


==signInOverlay==

Includes the sign-in overlay.

_Examples_

{{{
<janrain:signInOverlay />
}}}

_Attributes_

  * `defaultProvider` (optional) - The ..
  * `flags` (optional) - The ..
  * `languagePreference` (optional) - The language preference. E.g. `en` or `nl`
